tags: None
review: My grand mother had chest pain so went to hospital. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. I have plans to go for follow-up soon based on situation. There was less waiting time in the hospital when we went. Doctor was very friendly.

tags: None
review: My husband had been to hospital and it was for general heart checkup* ********* *** **** ** ******* I would like to recommend the doctor to other people.  Medicine was prescribed by doctor during consultation. There was less  waiting time in the hospital . It was 10-15 minutes. I am satisfied with the  treatment given by the doctor. Diet was suggested.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Took appointment for 5:30 and doctor showed up at 6 and then he had some personal things to take care of and started consultation at around 6:30. A bit of wait time is understandable but it was all too slow.and then although he asked some relevant questions, suggested some tests,*** ****** ** ** *** **** **** ********* *** ***** ******** ** *** *** *** **** ** *** ***** *** ********* **** ********* *** *** **** ** **** ***** *****it always easier to refer to other department,but felt may be he could have done a complete checkup with required tests to make sure the problem is not heart related.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very bad  service and experience. The doctors appointment takes a lot of time and not at all worth the time and money.

tags: None
review: My father had been to hospital and it was for high BP. ********* *** **** ** ******. I am satisfied with the explanation given by the doctor. I am unable to visit now. Medicine was prescribed by doctor during consultation. Scanning and blood test was done. There was some waiting time in the hospital when we went. Exercise was suggested and he told to cut salt intake. In July I have plans to visit again.

tags: None
review: The doctor is really patient, friendly and compassionate. He understands and listens to each and every detail and advises accordingly. Really happy experience. God bless him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I'm very much satisfied with doctor's treatment...I'm suffering with panic attacks since 2 years...I went to other cardiologist hospitals also..but no one suggested this test...sir suggested holter test to make sure of whether heart disease is there or not...

tags: None
review: my mom has undergone bypass surgery 14 years back and the surgery was done by Rayudu garu, till date my mom did not get even a single issue and we are very very happy with the treatment and also the way doctor respects the patients and take care of them he is very much trusted doctor in the city.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We thankful to have association with Dr.Raiyudu more than 2 decades ..We appreciate his profisiance  and patience while treating ...We over came many health hazards under his treatment taking this as an opportunity to thank him for his services and support ...laurdble

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Doctor RAYUDU  garu  interacted  with me  and  explained about the problem i am facing  and  given me  a great  confidence by explaining what  of best treatment and support he is giving to me to overcome from this cardiac problem and make me healthy.
 My sincere thanks to DR.RAYADU garu and DR. BHARAT REDDY GARU  who Gave a New Life to me

THANKS ALOT SIR'S

P.R.NAIK
